languages.text: "Разве? Тогда зачем ты вообще пытал{mf|ся|ась} заглянуть в мою истину, мон-кай? Зачем столь прилежно исполнял{mf||а} все то, что я нашептывал тебе? Не говори, что ты не улавливал{mf||а} искры того пламени, что вечно пылает во мне и мне подобных — пламени господства и насилия, главных истин этого мира. Даже твои примитивные чувства... способны на это".

"Is that so? Then why did you attempt to peer into my truth at all, mon-keigh? Why did you so diligently perform my every whispered command? Do not say that you were not singed by the sparks of the flame that burns eternal in me and my kind — the flame of domination and violence, the fundamental truths of this world. Even your primitive senses... are capable of that."
languages.original_text: "Разве? Тогда зачем ты вообще пытал{mf|ся|ась} заглянуть в мою истину, мон-кай? Зачем столь прилежно исполнял{mf||а} все то, что я нашептывал тебе? Не говори, что ты не улавливал{mf||а} искры того пламени, что вечно пылает во мне и мне подобных — пламени господства и насилия, главных истин этого мира. Даже твои примитивные чувства... способны на это".

traits.locale_text: "Is that so? Then why did you attempt to peer into my truth at all, mon-keigh? Why did you so diligently perform my every whispered command? Do not say that you were not singed by the sparks of the flame that burns eternal in me and my kind — the flame of domination and violence, the fundamental truths of this world. Even your primitive senses... are capable of that."

"Is that so? Then why did you attempt to peer into my truth at all, mon-keigh? Why did you so diligently perform my every whispered command? Do not say that you were not singed by the sparks of the flame that burns eternal in me and my kind — the flame of domination and violence, the fundamental truths of this world. Even your primitive senses... are capable of that."

"Is that so? Then why did you attempt to peer into my truth at all, mon-keigh? Why did you so diligently perform my every whispered command? Do not say that you were not singed by the sparks of the flame that burns eternal in me and my kind — the flame of domination and violence, the fundamental truths of this world. Even your primitive senses... are capable of that."

"Is that so? Then why did you attempt to peer into my truth at all, mon-keigh? Why did you so diligently perform my every whispered command? Do not say that you were not singed by the sparks of the flame that burns eternal in me and my kind — the flame of domination and violence, the fundamental truths of this world. Even your primitive senses... are capable of that."

languages.text: “是吗？如果真的是这样，那你为什么打算窥探我的本质呢，猴子？为什么你如此认真地执行着我低声说出的每个命令？我和我的族人身上燃烧着永不熄灭的烈焰，那是代表统治与暴力的烈焰，是这个世界最基本的真理。不要说什么你没有被这样的烈焰点燃。即便是你们原始的感官……也能感受到它的炽热。”
languages.original_text: "Is that so? Then why did you attempt to peer into my truth at all, mon-keigh? Why did you so diligently perform my every whispered command? Do not say that you were not singed by the sparks of the flame that burns eternal in me and my kind — the flame of domination and violence, the fundamental truths of this world. Even your primitive senses... are capable of that."

traits.locale_text: “是吗？如果真的是这样，那你为什么打算窥探我的本质呢，猴子？为什么你如此认真地执行着我低声说出的每个命令？我和我的族人身上燃烧着永不熄灭的烈焰，那是代表统治与暴力的烈焰，是这个世界最基本的真理。不要说什么你没有被这样的烈焰点燃。即便是你们原始的感官……也能感受到它的炽热。”

languages.text: 「へえ？じゃあ、なぜお前は俺の真実をチラリとでも覗き込もうとした、モン＝ケイ？なぜ俺が囁いた命令を熱心に実行した？まさか、俺と俺の種族の中で永遠に燃える炎の火花に焦がれていないなんて言わないだろうな…支配と暴力の炎、この世界の根本的な真実だ。お前のその原始的な感覚でも…分かるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Is that so? Then why did you attempt to peer into my truth at all, mon-keigh? Why did you so diligently perform my every whispered command? Do not say that you were not singed by the sparks of the flame that burns eternal in me and my kind — the flame of domination and violence, the fundamental truths of this world. Even your primitive senses... are capable of that."

traits.locale_text: 「へえ？じゃあ、なぜお前は俺の真実をチラリとでも覗き込もうとした、モン＝ケイ？なぜ俺が囁いた命令を熱心に実行した？まさか、俺と俺の種族の中で永遠に燃える炎の火花に焦がれていないなんて言わないだろうな…支配と暴力の炎、この世界の根本的な真実だ。お前のその原始的な感覚でも…分かるだろう」

languages.text: «¿No me digas? ¿Entonces por qué has intentado descubrir mi verdad, mon-keigh? ¿Por qué has cumplido con tanta diligencia todas las órdenes que te he susurrado? No digas que no te has encendido al sentir las chispas de la llama que arde perpetuamente en mí y en los míos, el fuego de la dominación y la violencia, las verdades fundamentales de este mundo. Incluso tus primitivos sentidos... son receptivos a eso».
languages.original_text: "Is that so? Then why did you attempt to peer into my truth at all, mon-keigh? Why did you so diligently perform my every whispered command? Do not say that you were not singed by the sparks of the flame that burns eternal in me and my kind — the flame of domination and violence, the fundamental truths of this world. Even your primitive senses... are capable of that."

traits.locale_text: «¿No me digas? ¿Entonces por qué has intentado descubrir mi verdad, mon-keigh? ¿Por qué has cumplido con tanta diligencia todas las órdenes que te he susurrado? No digas que no te has encendido al sentir las chispas de la llama que arde perpetuamente en mí y en los míos, el fuego de la dominación y la violencia, las verdades fundamentales de este mundo. Incluso tus primitivos sentidos... son receptivos a eso».

languages.text: « Vraiment ? Dans ce cas, pourquoi avez-vous cherché à entrevoir la vérité qui est la mienne, mon-keigh ? Pourquoi vous être donné tant de mal pour satisfaire à mes moindres exigences ? Ne me dites pas que vous n'avez pas ressenti la brûlure du feu éternel qui nous consume de l'intérieur, moi et les miens, la flamme de la domination et de la violence, les seules vérités fondamentales de ce monde. Si primitive soit votre race, je sais pertinemment que vous y êtes sensible. »
languages.original_text: "Is that so? Then why did you attempt to peer into my truth at all, mon-keigh? Why did you so diligently perform my every whispered command? Do not say that you were not singed by the sparks of the flame that burns eternal in me and my kind — the flame of domination and violence, the fundamental truths of this world. Even your primitive senses... are capable of that."

traits.locale_text: « Vraiment ? Dans ce cas, pourquoi avez-vous cherché à entrevoir la vérité qui est la mienne, mon-keigh ? Pourquoi vous être donné tant de mal pour satisfaire à mes moindres exigences ? Ne me dites pas que vous n'avez pas ressenti la brûlure du feu éternel qui nous consume de l'intérieur, moi et les miens, la flamme de la domination et de la violence, les seules vérités fondamentales de ce monde. Si primitive soit votre race, je sais pertinemment que vous y êtes sensible. »

languages.text: "Findet Ihr? Warum habt Ihr dann überhaupt versucht, meine Wahrheit zu erblicken, Chem-Pan-Sey? Und warum habt Ihr so eifrig jeden meiner geflüsterten Befehle ausgeführt? Erzählt mir nicht, dass ihr nicht vom Funken der Flamme erfasst wurdet, die in mir und den Meinen schon ewig brennt – die Flamme der Dominanz und Gewalt, die die fundamentalen Wahrheiten dieser Welt bilden. Selbst Euren primitiven Sinne ... sind dazu fähig."
languages.original_text: "Is that so? Then why did you attempt to peer into my truth at all, mon-keigh? Why did you so diligently perform my every whispered command? Do not say that you were not singed by the sparks of the flame that burns eternal in me and my kind — the flame of domination and violence, the fundamental truths of this world. Even your primitive senses... are capable of that."

traits.locale_text: "Findet Ihr? Warum habt Ihr dann überhaupt versucht, meine Wahrheit zu erblicken, Chem-Pan-Sey? Und warum habt Ihr so eifrig jeden meiner geflüsterten Befehle ausgeführt? Erzählt mir nicht, dass ihr nicht vom Funken der Flamme erfasst wurdet, die in mir und den Meinen schon ewig brennt – die Flamme der Dominanz und Gewalt, die die fundamentalen Wahrheiten dieser Welt bilden. Selbst Euren primitiven Sinne ... sind dazu fähig."

languages.text: "Öyle mi? Peki o zaman neden hakikatimi keşfetmeye çalıştın mon-keigh? Kulağına fısıldadığım tüm emirleri neden böylesine özenle yerine getirdin? Bende ve soydaşlarımda ebediyen yanan o alevin, bu dünyanın en temel hakikatleri olan hâkimiyet ve şiddet alevinin kıvılcımlarının seni çağırmadığını söyleme bana. Senin o ilkel duyuların bile... Bunu algılayabilir."
languages.original_text: "Is that so? Then why did you attempt to peer into my truth at all, mon-keigh? Why did you so diligently perform my every whispered command? Do not say that you were not singed by the sparks of the flame that burns eternal in me and my kind — the flame of domination and violence, the fundamental truths of this world. Even your primitive senses... are capable of that."

traits.locale_text: "Öyle mi? Peki o zaman neden hakikatimi keşfetmeye çalıştın mon-keigh? Kulağına fısıldadığım tüm emirleri neden böylesine özenle yerine getirdin? Bende ve soydaşlarımda ebediyen yanan o alevin, bu dünyanın en temel hakikatleri olan hâkimiyet ve şiddet alevinin kıvılcımlarının seni çağırmadığını söyleme bana. Senin o ilkel duyuların bile... Bunu algılayabilir."
